Reviews.Title: This was a Refurbished unit.
Reviews.Author: david j hayes
Reviews.Content: This was a Refurbished unit.  it arrived clean, boxed, and replaced the broken unit that I had.  One of the keys is a bit sticky from time to time, But over all - I'm Happy with it.  I would go back to the company the next time I need a Refurbished unit.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone Purchase
Reviews.Author: dean
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for my broken LG CF360 and I paid the extra $2.50 for quicker delivery. I ordered it on the 1st of June and it came on the 5th of June. The phone is like new and it works fine. I feel the price was fair also. I am very satisfied with the phone and with "GuyBuy". Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Thompson
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, Its little and simple to use, all my family and friends say I need a smart phone, or at least an updated phone, I have had this one for 5 years now and have had no problems, most my family and frineds have been through several, it speaks for it self......I am only looking for another one just like it, cause after 5 years a button or two is starting to stick and I have managed to wear a little hole by the menu button probley from fake nails...lol I carry mine in a cigg case and it fits perfect, love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Satified Customer
Reviews.Author: unbweavable
Reviews.Content: Broke my phone but just didn't want to buy another one or get into another contract. Just blessed to have found one that works for me and it work Well!!!! LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Cute but weak battery
Reviews.Author: Cameron Dill
Reviews.Content: This is an adorable phone. The quality is a strong appearance and a strong feel. The only ONE problem is the battery. It has to constantly be recharged. Send 10 text messages and the phone shuts down. Talk for 10 minutes or less the it will turn off right in the middle of a conversation. Low battery is this phones first name.

Reviews.Title: I love LG!
Reviews.Author: Chrissa
Reviews.Content: This phone was exactly what I was looking for! I love to carry my cell in my pocket which I could not do with my touch screen phone!

Reviews.Title: Crap!
Reviews.Author: Eugene Thompson
Reviews.Content: this phone is not worth the buy, save your money, the battery dies in a half a day, no matter what use or not use, save your money.

Reviews.Title: Garbage music player, rest okay
Reviews.Author: Chris Rokusek
Reviews.Content: I have a CF360 and the music player is garbage.  It locks up and freezes the entire phone.  LG Customer support website is so bad that it won't allow a repair order to be generated.  I have alos filed a customer support ticket has resulted in no response so far as well.  Might be a great phone except the music player.  The software used to update the firmware does not support the CF360 even though the LG site claims that it does.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: geraldine
Reviews.Content: great phone took it to jamaica and it worked well everyone loved it, will buy more in the future if need arise

Reviews.Title: Decent phone with a bonus!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The phone in itself is in no way exceptional. It is not a smart phone, but it works very well. The battery leaves something to be desired, but you can pick up an extra for about $5 so that's not really a big deal for me at all. Why did I give it four stars tho? Because you can use it to tether. I have the $50 a month unlimited prepaid plan from AT&T; and so far I have been able to use the tethered connection perfectly well. It's only 3g speeds so it's nothing exceptional, but it's certainly useful. If you want a cheap way to tether, you should consider this phone.

Reviews.Title: Things are never what they seem (in pictures)
Reviews.Author: L.C.R
Reviews.Content: I am not much of a phone snob, and i don't like "smart phones".  A simple, quality cell phone is good enough for me. This is why i decided to purchase the LG Shine Cf360.  I have had an LG Shine before, but in a different model.  In any case, the LG phone i used before was a great phone.  Good quality.  This phone? It was worse than a "play phone" you get for your child at Toys-R-Us.  Aside from the poor quality of the phone, it did not even work!  I charged it fully and the phone would not turn on.All in all... a bad purchase.  Don't buy this phone unless you want a disposable cell phone (in which case, you can just get yourself a Go Phone).
